3840.verse: يَقُولُ|Who (would) say,|137|168|77$أَءِنَّكَ|`Are you indeed|127|189|9245$لَمِنَ|surely of|77|139|1196$ٱلْمُصَدِّقِينَ|those who believe?|147|178|14626$

3841.verse: أَءِذَا|Is (it) when|98|117|9334$مِتْنَا|we have died|108|146|12352$وَكُنَّا|and become|100|138|6992$تُرَابًا|dust|66|104|12280$وَعِظَـٰمًا|and bones,|97|135|12281$أَءِنَّا|will we|64|83|9336$لَمَدِينُونَ|surely be brought to Judgment?``|246|246|14627$

3843.verse: فَٱطَّلَعَ|Then he (will) look|142|163|14629$فَرَءَاهُ|and see him|99|140|14340$فِى|in|48|90|89$سَوَآءِ|(the) midst|94|136|5093$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|(of) the Hellfire.|126|147|1107$

3845.verse: وَلَوْلَا|And if not|85|101|2238$نِعْمَةُ|(for the) Grace|120|152|14631$رَبِّى|(of) my Lord,|107|139|2902$لَكُنتُ|certainly, I (would) have been|221|253|14632$مِنَ|among|63|79|156$ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ|those brought.`|132|132|13500$

3851.verse: إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|134|120$جَعَلْنَـٰهَا|[We] have made it|144|219|12087$فِتْنَةً|a trial|58|133|7216$لِّلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|for the wrongdoers.|151|189|2438$

3853.verse: طَلْعُهَا|Its emerging fruit|134|172|13024$كَأَنَّهُۥ|(is) as if it|89|166|6983$رُءُوسُ|(was) heads|102|179|14643$ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ|(of) the devils.|119|158|10323$

3854.verse: فَإِنَّهُمْ|And indeed, they|133|142|3266$لَأَكِلُونَ|(will) surely eat|123|141|14644$مِنْهَا|from it|63|81|246$فَمَالِــُٔونَ|and fill|94|112|14645$مِنْهَا|with it|62|80|246$ٱلْبُطُونَ|(their) bellies.|112|121|14646$

3861.verse: فَٱنظُرْ|Then see|81|103|2332$كَيْفَ|how|66|110|288$كَانَ|was|57|100|913$عَـٰقِبَةُ|(the) end|83|126|3299$ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ|(of) those who were warned,|214|236|8243$

3863.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily,|90|113|640$نَادَٮٰنَا|called Us|79|125|14651$نُوحٌ|Nuh;|60|106|12995$فَلَنِعْمَ|and Best|78|124|14652$ٱلْمُجِيبُونَ|(are We as) Responders!|184|207|14653$

3864.verse: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ|And We saved him|142|165|11855$وَأَهْلَهُۥ|and his family|110|156|6579$مِنَ|from|50|96|156$ٱلْكَرْبِ|the distress,|103|149|11866$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|the great.|87|110|996$

3840.verse: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe

3841.verse: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"

3842.verse: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"

3843.verse: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.

3844.verse: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.

3845.verse: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].

3846.verse: Then, are we not to die

3847.verse: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"

3848.verse: Indeed, this is the great attainment.

3849.verse: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.

3850.verse: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?

3851.verse: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.

3852.verse: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,

3853.verse: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.

3854.verse: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.

3855.verse: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.

3856.verse: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.

3857.verse: Indeed they found their fathers astray.

3858.verse: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.

3859.verse: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,

3860.verse: And We had already sent among them warners.

3861.verse: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -

3862.verse: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

3863.verse: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.

3864.verse: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.
